answers.answer: Sounds like braxton hicks with the hot flash and tightening. You may be having contractions...try to time it if it keeps happening and drink water
Yes. Call your doctor or go to the emergency room asap. Could be something like preeclampsia or worse.
It could be Braxton hicks but Better safe than sorry if you ask me.
Drink a big glass of cold water, but if it makes you feel better go into the hospital that is what they are there for dear:)Good Luck!

question: 33 weeks and experienced a hot flash that included pressure in my belly like it is tightening on and off, my legs feel like I am getting cramps before your period starts and I felt instantly sick to my stomach. It been an hour now and it's still going on. Is this something to worry about?
title: worried- please help
